TextView.android:text:
Filter checkbox will allow you to see only items that you either have or have not acquired.

Selected checkbox determines which items you will see (items you have selected or not selected) if filter is checked. (Selected has no effect when filter is unchecked)

 Examples: 

To see only items you have not selected, check filter and leave selected unchecked.

To see all items, regardless of whether they were selected or not, simply uncheck filter.
